```markdown

[![Release](https://github.com/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro/workflows/Release/badge.svg)](https://github.com/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro/actions/workflows/release.yml)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro)
```

## Example README Header

```markdown
# Architect Linter Pro

[![CI](https://github.com/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro/actions)
[![Version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro)](https://github.com/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro/releases)
[![Tests](https://img.shields.io/badge/tests-134%20passing-success)](https://github.com/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro/actions)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/USERNAME/architect-linter-pro)](LICENSE)

> Multi-language architecture linter with Health Score system

**Supported Languages:** TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Go, PHP, Java
```

---

**Note:** Replace `USERNAME` with your GitHub username.
